details:
* [CVE-2018-16395](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2018-16395)
Fix for OpenSSL::X509::Name equality check.
* [CVE-2018-16396](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2018-16396)
Tainted flags are not propagated in Array#pack and String#unpack
 with some directives.


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
2.1.5-2+deb8u6.


We recommend that you upgrade your ruby2.1 packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
